m_szDocSumamry: Green cars that do not emit harmful gases are gaining popularity in the auto industry. The Honda Clarity Fuel Cell, Hyundai Tucson Fuel Cell and Nissan Leaf are some green cars available in the U.S. (Photo : Hyundai) Carmakers are focusing on green cars and a number of companies have vehicles that have less impact on the environment in comparison to the cars running on diesel or gasoline. Here is a news roundup of some green cars: Honda Clarity Fuel Cell, Hyundai Tuscan Fuel Cell and the Nissan Leaf.
